name: The Vortex (itch)
description:
Vortex is game for GMTK Jam 2018. 

It's top-down shooter without shooting. 

The 

Push them all to obstacles!
You can spawn the physics vortex, blast or just push enemies with The Force.

Controls: 

  • move with WSAD 
  • push with mouse 1
  • use ability with mouse 2
  • choose ability with numbers 1 or 2
